addtagstoonpremisesinstances.name: AddTagsToOnPremisesInstances
addtagstoonpremisesinstances.description: Grants permission to add tags to one or more on-premises instances

batchgetapplicationrevisions.name: BatchGetApplicationRevisions
batchgetapplicationrevisions.description: Grants permission to get information about one or more application revisions

batchgetapplications.name: BatchGetApplications
batchgetapplications.description: Grants permission to get information about multiple applications associated with the IAM user

batchgetdeploymentgroups.name: BatchGetDeploymentGroups
batchgetdeploymentgroups.description: Grants permission to get information about one or more deployment groups

batchgetdeploymentinstances.name: BatchGetDeploymentInstances
batchgetdeploymentinstances.description: Grants permission to get information about one or more instance that are part of a deployment group

batchgetdeploymenttargets.name: BatchGetDeploymentTargets
batchgetdeploymenttargets.description: Grants permission to return an array of one or more targets associated with a deployment. This method works with all compute types and should be used instead of the deprecated BatchGetDeploymentInstances. The maximum number of targets that can be returned is 25

batchgetdeployments.name: BatchGetDeployments
batchgetdeployments.description: Grants permission to get information about multiple deployments associated with the IAM user

batchgetonpremisesinstances.name: BatchGetOnPremisesInstances
batchgetonpremisesinstances.description: Grants permission to get information about one or more on-premises instances

continuedeployment.name: ContinueDeployment
continuedeployment.description: Grants permission to start the process of rerouting traffic from instances in the original environment to instances in thereplacement environment without waiting for a specified wait time to elapse

createapplication.name: CreateApplication
createapplication.description: Grants permission to create an application associated with the IAM user

createcloudformationdeployment.name: CreateCloudFormationDeployment
createcloudformationdeployment.description: Grants permission to create CloudFormation deployment to cooperate ochestration for a CloudFormation stack update

createdeployment.name: CreateDeployment
createdeployment.description: Grants permission to create a deployment for an application associated with the IAM user

createdeploymentconfig.name: CreateDeploymentConfig
createdeploymentconfig.description: Grants permission to create a custom deployment configuration associated with the IAM user

createdeploymentgroup.name: CreateDeploymentGroup
createdeploymentgroup.description: Grants permission to create a deployment group for an application associated with the IAM user

deleteapplication.name: DeleteApplication
deleteapplication.description: Grants permission to delete an application associated with the IAM user

deletedeploymentconfig.name: DeleteDeploymentConfig
deletedeploymentconfig.description: Grants permission to delete a custom deployment configuration associated with the IAM user

deletedeploymentgroup.name: DeleteDeploymentGroup
deletedeploymentgroup.description: Grants permission to delete a deployment group for an application associated with the IAM user

deletegithubaccounttoken.name: DeleteGitHubAccountToken
deletegithubaccounttoken.description: Grants permission to delete a GitHub account connection

deleteresourcesbyexternalid.name: DeleteResourcesByExternalId
deleteresourcesbyexternalid.description: Grants permission to delete resources associated with the given external Id

deregisteronpremisesinstance.name: DeregisterOnPremisesInstance
deregisteronpremisesinstance.description: Grants permission to deregister an on-premises instance

getapplication.name: GetApplication
getapplication.description: Grants permission to get information about a single application associated with the IAM user

getapplicationrevision.name: GetApplicationRevision
getapplicationrevision.description: Grants permission to get information about a single application revision for an application associated with the IAM user

getdeployment.name: GetDeployment
getdeployment.description: Grants permission to get information about a single deployment to a deployment group for an application associated with the IAM user

getdeploymentconfig.name: GetDeploymentConfig
getdeploymentconfig.description: Grants permission to get information about a single deployment configuration associated with the IAM user

getdeploymentgroup.name: GetDeploymentGroup
getdeploymentgroup.description: Grants permission to get information about a single deployment group for an application associated with the IAM user

getdeploymentinstance.name: GetDeploymentInstance
getdeploymentinstance.description: Grants permission to get information about a single instance in a deployment associated with the IAM user

getdeploymenttarget.name: GetDeploymentTarget
getdeploymenttarget.description: Grants permission to return information about a deployment target

getonpremisesinstance.name: GetOnPremisesInstance
getonpremisesinstance.description: Grants permission to get information about a single on-premises instance

listapplicationrevisions.name: ListApplicationRevisions
listapplicationrevisions.description: Grants permission to get information about all application revisions for an application associated with the IAM user

listapplications.name: ListApplications
listapplications.description: Grants permission to get information about all applications associated with the IAM user

listdeploymentconfigs.name: ListDeploymentConfigs
listdeploymentconfigs.description: Grants permission to get information about all deployment configurations associated with the IAM user

listdeploymentgroups.name: ListDeploymentGroups
listdeploymentgroups.description: Grants permission to get information about all deployment groups for an application associated with the IAM user

listdeploymentinstances.name: ListDeploymentInstances
listdeploymentinstances.description: Grants permission to get information about all instances in a deployment associated with the IAM user

listdeploymenttargets.name: ListDeploymentTargets
listdeploymenttargets.description: Grants permission to return an array of target IDs that are associated a deployment

listdeployments.name: ListDeployments
listdeployments.description: Grants permission to get information about all deployments to a deployment group associated with the IAM user, or to get all deployments associated with the IAM user

listgithubaccounttokennames.name: ListGitHubAccountTokenNames
listgithubaccounttokennames.description: Grants permission to list the names of stored connections to GitHub accounts

listonpremisesinstances.name: ListOnPremisesInstances
listonpremisesinstances.description: Grants permission to get a list of one or more on-premises instance names

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to return a list of tags for the resource identified by a specified ARN. Tags are used to organize and categorize your CodeDeploy resources

putlifecycleeventhookexecutionstatus.name: PutLifecycleEventHookExecutionStatus
putlifecycleeventhookexecutionstatus.description: Grants permission to notify a lifecycle event hook execution status for associated deployment with the IAM user

registerapplicationrevision.name: RegisterApplicationRevision
registerapplicationrevision.description: Grants permission to register information about an application revision for an application associated with the IAM user

registeronpremisesinstance.name: RegisterOnPremisesInstance
registeronpremisesinstance.description: Grants permission to register an on-premises instance

removetagsfromonpremisesinstances.name: RemoveTagsFromOnPremisesInstances
removetagsfromonpremisesinstances.description: Grants permission to remove tags from one or more on-premises instances

skipwaittimeforinstancetermination.name: SkipWaitTimeForInstanceTermination
skipwaittimeforinstancetermination.description: Grants permission to override any specified wait time and starts terminating instances immediately after the traffic routing is complete. This action applies to blue-green deployments only

stopdeployment.name: StopDeployment
stopdeployment.description: Grants permission to stop a deployment

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to associate the list of tags in the input Tags parameter with the resource identified by the ResourceArn input parameter

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to disassociate a resource from a list of tags. The resource is identified by the ResourceArn input parameter. The tags are identfied by the list of keys in the TagKeys input parameter

updateapplication.name: UpdateApplication
updateapplication.description: Grants permission to update an application

updatedeploymentgroup.name: UpdateDeploymentGroup
updatedeploymentgroup.description: Grants permission to change information about a single deployment group for an application associated with the IAM user
